item.title: Christmas cracker help!
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

pseudocode:

if player is using christmas cracker on another valid player
     send message to both players 'You pull the cracker'
     create a random boolean value (0, 1) to decide which player receives the prize
     delete the cracker from the player's inventory
     if random boolean value is 0
          add the prize to the player's inventory
          send message to player indicating that he received the prize
          send message to player who the cracker was pulled on indicating he did not receive the prize
     else
          add the prize to the other player's inventory
          send message to player who the cracker was pulled on indicating that he received the prize
          send message to player indicating he did not receive the prize

Read full topic
